name: Black Hole
startIntroPart1: Sturm, you are a mighty and fearsome leader. You are a being who despise peace and enjoys the glories of war. Although little are known about your past, you are well known for the conquests and victories that you had achieved. No one knows how many have fallen victim by your ruthlessness and no one knows how many lives were paid for the countless wars that you have started. But despite of those, one thing is for sure, your men views you as an indomitable warrior and will do anything that you will even if it costs them death.
startIntroPart2: After travelling and venturing for so long, you then saw this planet filled with great civilizations that has their own unique characteristics, where some also seeks glory through wars such as you. Sturm, conqueror of the worlds, how shall you deal with this planet? Shall you crush them all and add the numbers of the fallen victims of your conquests? Or shall you take a different route this time?
declaringWar: Your time is about to come! Tremble before me and I may still spare your miserable life!
attacked: Fool! Do you really think you can defeat me?
defeated: You... Worm! Just a little more and I could have destroyed this miserable world!
introduction: Hmph! What do you want human?
neutralNo: I do not like your offer
hateNo: Do you wish to be destroyed right now?
afterPeace: Hmph! Don't think that I'm already done with you.
tradeRequest: Be blessed that I made this offer at the first place.
uniqueText: Units excel in combat no matter what are the situation, granting +20% combat bonus. Units also ignores terrain cost.
uniques: +[20]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Friendly Land]
+[20]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Foreign Land]

name: Orange Star
startIntroPart1: Ah! Greetings Ms. Nell! I am here today to give you a short briefing. The top leaders of our council has chosen you to lead our glorious country. As you may know, our country has fought so much wars within the past years, where even at one point we are fighting the whole world.
startIntroPart2: Ms. Nell, the people are now here to listen to your orders. Can you help our country strive into greatness? Can you, build and lead our nation to new brillance that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: I'm feeling lucky today! I hope your troops are ready for mine!
defeated: Well done cadet! I am now confident to announce that you are now a fully pledged CO!
afterPeace: You passed the test cadet, well done on your training!
tradeRequest: This trade offer will bring you luck!
uniqueText: Great Generals, as well Great Scientists are 20% much faster.

name: Blue Moon
startIntroPart1: Sturm, you are a mighty and fearsome leader. You are a being who despise peace and enjoys the glories of war. Although little are known about your past, you are well known for the conquests and victories that you had achieved. No one knows how many have fallen victim by your ruthlessness and no one knows how many lives were paid for the countless wars that you have started. But despite of those, one thing is for sure, your men views you as an indomitable warrior and will do anything that you will even if it costs them death.
startIntroPart2: Commander Olaf! The people now await your guidance! Can you lead our glorious nation into greatness that no other civilization can match? Is your great skill in leading our troops can match your skill as a leader of a great nation? Can you construct a great country that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: For the glory of Blue Moon! Chaaaaaaarge!!!
attacked: Hoho! Do you really think your pitiful troops could stand the cold?
defeated: What!? Me? Defeated!? Impossible! Why must it all come to this?
introduction: Greetings stranger! I hope you are used to the cold weather! As this can be felt through all year round!
hateLetsHearIt: What do you wish to say?
afterPeace: Let us forget the past and move foward for our futures!
tradeRequest: The people of Blue Moon would like to share their wealth with you!
uniqueText: Units likes fighting in the cold, receiving +10% combat bonus on Snow and Tundra tiles. However, units hates the rain, receiving -10% penalty in Jungle tiles.
uniques: +[10]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Snow]
+[10]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Tundra]
-[10]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Jungle]

name: Yellow Comet
startIntroPart1: Sturm, you are a mighty and fearsome leader. You are a being who despise peace and enjoys the glories of war. Although little are known about your past, you are well known for the conquests and victories that you had achieved. No one knows how many have fallen victim by your ruthlessness and no one knows how many lives were paid for the countless wars that you have started. But despite of those, one thing is for sure, your men views you as an indomitable warrior and will do anything that you will even if it costs them death.
startIntroPart2: My Emperor, the people needs you again, as our illustrious empire is once more, about to face a great trial.
declaringWar: We have endured your foul stench for so long. But now, you are but to suffer under the steel of my blade! Prepare yourself!
attacked: Ha! Do not underestimate us! I shall build a mountain of troops to stop your advance!
defeated: What!? Those base are useless! Perhaps my daughter was right about THAT plan.
introduction: Ah! A foreigner! We humbly welcome you to our land!
neutralNo: I do not like your offer
hateNo: Do you wish to be destroyed right now?
afterPeace: You have fought well, It was an honor to fight you!
uniqueText: Military units are well disciplined, receiving +30% combat bonus on all terrains, however they are all expensive, decreasing the production speed and increasing the maintenance cost.
uniques: +[30]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Friendly Land]
+[30]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Foreign Land]

name: Green Earth
startIntroPart1: Sturm, you are a mighty and fearsome leader. You are a being who despise peace and enjoys the glories of war. Although little are known about your past, you are well known for the conquests and victories that you had achieved. No one knows how many have fallen victim by your ruthlessness and no one knows how many lives were paid for the countless wars that you have started. But despite of those, one thing is for sure, your men views you as an indomitable warrior and will do anything that you will even if it costs them death.
startIntroPart2: After travelling and venturing for so long, you then saw this planet filled with great civilizations that has their own unique characteristics, where some also seeks glory through wars such as you. Sturm, conqueror of the worlds, how shall you deal with this planet? Shall you crush them all and add the numbers of the fallen victims of your conquests? Or shall you take a different route this time?
declaringWar: I have no interests on underlings such as you, begone!
attacked: Haha! Do you think you can keep up?
defeated: You... I will never forgive you to what you have done to my country!
neutralNo: I do not like your offer
hateNo: Do you wish to be destroyed right now?
afterPeace: Hah, you are not that bad after all.
tradeRequest: This trade could bring a strategic advantage between the two of us!
uniqueText: Air units can attack in longer distances, Helicopters can also attack twice. They also receive +15% combat bonus. But all naval units suffer -15% combat penalty.
